channel.title: Fibre on Reveting to Type
channel.description: Recent content in Fibre on Reveting to Type

item.title: Fibre To The Home
item.description: I recently signed up for Eir’s fibre-based broadband package and took an immediate dislike to the Sagemcom router that it came with. It was fiddly to configure and I wanted to see if I could swap it out for an existing and more familiar broadband router I already had. This article outlines how I did this by flashing the old router with open source OpenWRT/LEDE software and configuring a VLAN to get it to work.
